content:
Who are Ellis Audio?

Ellis Audio provide high quality Audio/Visual equipment for Parties, Weddings, Live Music and Corporate events. Custom Packages are also available, please see our inventory under Equipment for Hire. For all enquiries contact Nick on 0458 708 648.

Need an operator?

While we are able to provide training for small systems, sometime you need a more experienced operator, we are more than happy to organise someone to help.

Pickup and Delivery

All packages and pricing include pickup only. Delivery and setup is available with prices starting from $40, surcharges may apply.
